name: Play-swagger-ui
tagline: swagger api doc integration with play ui/api application
body:
# Swagger UI for the Play restful api application

## Overview
Utility class, which will read the play framework route file and create swagger json.  No more swagger annotation required to generate the swagger ui integration.

swagger api - http://localhost:9000/swagger-ui/index.html

##Version
1.0 - Initial commit
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
